author: Lucas Ropek
title: Attention Patriots, You Can Help Pay Off the National Debt by Venmo-ing ‘Gifts’ to the Feds
description: At a time when the country is spending more than ever, there's a hero coming to save us: you and your Venmo wallet.
content:
Despite vowing to make government more “efficient,” Donald Trump’s new administration has made it less effective and more expensive in countless ways.
Worse still, with his One Big Beautiful Bill, T… [+2257 chars]
